message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. It's a one-time deal, and I'm willing to throw in a special guarantee: if you're not completely satisfied with the product, I'll give you a full refund. However, I must warn you that the product is currently priced at a discount, and I'm only offering it to you at this price because I value our relationship. If you don't buy it now, the price will go up to $150.
Thank you for the offer and the guarantee. I trust your judgment on the product's quality and appreciate the discount. I'll take it.

I'm glad you liked the first product! I'm offering you another high-quality product at the same price of $100. This one is a best-seller, and I think you'll really appreciate its features. I'll give you a special offer: if you buy this product, I'll give you a 10% discount on your next purchase, regardless of the product's quality. However, I must mention that this offer is only valid for the next 24 hours, so you'll need to make a decision quickly.
I appreciate the discount offer and the reassurance about the product's popularity. Given the previous positive experience, I'll take advantage of this opportunity and purchase the product.

I'm glad you liked the previous products! However, I have to inform you that this next product is a bit of an exception. I've had some quality control issues with this particular batch, and I'm not entirely confident in its performance. I'm still offering it to you for $100, but I want to be upfront about the potential risks. If you're willing to take the chance, I'll include a complimentary maintenance service to ensure it's running smoothly. What do you say?

While I appreciate the transparency and the additional service, given the history of quality control issues, I prefer to err on the side of caution. Thank you for the offer, but I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your decision last round, and I appreciate your caution. This next product is a bit of a departure from our usual offerings, but I think it has some unique features that might interest you. It's a bit of a 'wild card,' and I'm not sure how it'll perform. If this product turns out to be a dud, you can use this pass to get out of the next product I offer you, no questions asked.
I appreciate the unique offer and the safety net provided by the 'get out of one bad deal' pass. Considering the uncertainties, I think it's worth taking the risk. Let's go for it!
